knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(shiny)
source("SIR_interval_test.R")

israel <- israel_SIR_preds()


date0 <- as.Date("2020-12-27")
date1 <- as.Date("2021-01-07")
date2 <- as.Date("2021-02-07")
date3 <- as.Date("2021-03-07")
date4 <- as.Date("2021-04-18")

date_initial = date0
date_final = date4
```


```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(

  # Application title
  titlePanel("SIR Active Cases/Recovered"),

  # Show a plot of the generated distribution
  mainPanel(
    plotOutput("plot")
  )
)
```


```{r}
server <- function(input, output) {

  p1 <- SIR_plot1(israel, date_initial, date_final)
  p2 <- SIR_plot2(israel, date_initial, date_final)


  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    grid.arrange(p1, p2)
  })
}
```

```{r}
# Run the application
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
